AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: Phenominal Cosmic Power, Ity Bity Living Space
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Obtain a super creating pill, which can turn any pawn into a superhero.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: Creating a new league?
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Have 10 super creating pills at the same time. Maybe you should use some of them now.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: Is This Thing On?
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Use Psychic Disconnection to remove a pawn's psychic sensitivity temporarily.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: I'll Wake You Up Later
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Use the Regenesis ability on a pawn.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: Shaking in Your Boots
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Have fear inflicted on any pawn. The severity of the fear does not matter.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: Gambling is Fun
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Have a total of 50 pawns get affected by an Astral Psionist Chaotic Planet ability.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: Why is There a Limit?
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Build an Unshakable Team with a Psionic Unifier and wonder why it caps at 20 people.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: Stasis
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Put a pawn into stasis. Not much of a long term fix, but it can help in the short term.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: Empires Will Fall
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Have a Psionic Conqueror make their desire for world domination well known.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: RAMPAAAGE
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Use the Hemopriest's bloodlust ability to make a pawn start rampaging.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: It's Like Removing and Regrowing a Limb
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Use the Hemomorph's Starfish split ability. Please don't try this at home.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: Master Thief
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Have a hemo-thief with all three stealing buffs active at the same time.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: Bathing in Blood
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Have a hemo-warrior with all three basic buffs active at the same time.

AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.label: Give Me a Minute!
AchievementsExpanded.AchievementDef.description: Have a hemo-champion with True Regeneration lose any part. They'll be fine. Eventually.
